original_title: Derby Days Superclásico: Boca Juniors v River Plate
overview: Quite simply the biggest derby in history. The match of the century. The derby to end all derbies. Boca Juniors vs River Plate in the Copa Libertadores final is like el clasico in the Champions League final with a bomb under it. Eli Mengem travelled to Buenos Aires knowing all this… but still couldn’t have predicted just how crazy this game was going to be.
tagline: The Biggest Game of All Time
title: Derby Days Superclásico: Boca Juniors v River Plate
